text: Miscellaneous file should be opened when

options.A: the original file form document cannot be located
options.B: there is insufficient correspondence from one source to justify opening new file.
options.C: there is insufficient time for the filing clerk to assemble relevant document to open a new file
options.D: there are sufficient documents from various sources to justify opening a new file

explanation: Miscellaneous file should be opened when there is insufficient time for the filing clerk to assemble relevant document to open a new file.

text: Transmission of information between officers of the same level is
explanation: Horizontal communication is used in the transmission of information between officers of the same level. It is used to disseminate information or messages between officers at the same level.

text: "Who is who" is a book that contains information of

options.A: important people who are still living.

explanation: "Who is who" is a book that contains information of important people who are still living. It is a book that contains the name of prominent people.

text: Which of the following documents is handled by the receptionist?
explanation: Telephone message pad is one of the documents handled by the receptionist.

text: The type of incoming mail that should be delivered to their addresses unopened is
explanation: Registered mail is a type of incoming mail that should be delivered to their addresses unopened. It is a type of mail that is sealed.

text: Filing document according to dates is
explanation: Chronological filing is a filing method whereby documents are filed according to date.

text: The three components of a short report are the

options.C: terms of reference, body and conclusion.
options.D: terms of reference, body and recommendations

explanation: A short report comprises of introduction, body and conclusion.

text: The communication channel in the diagram above is
explanation: The communication channel in the diagram below is lateral communication channelGeneral manager↓             ↓Personal manager   marketing manager

text: A committee which ceases to exist after completing its assignment is
explanation: An investigatory committee is a committee which ceases to exist after completing its assignment. It is setup to make findings about a particular matter or issue in an organisation.

text: Which of the following statements is true about a quotation? It shows the

options.B: quality of goods in the warehouse.

explanation: Quotation is the supplier's reply to the letter of enquiry which states the price, terms of payment, delivery dates and any discount. It is a statement.

text: To break a tie resulting from a poll, the chairman should

options.B: use his power of casting vote
options.C: use his discretion to take a decision
options.D: ask his executive members to advise him

explanation: To break a tie resulting from a poll, the chairman should use his power of casting vote.

text: The raw materials and equipment needed in an organization should be bought by the
explanation: Purchasing department is the department that is responsible for buying raw materials, stationery, component, trolls, plant and machinery e.t.c

text: A letter sent by Mrs. Benson to her husband by post through his office address is an example of
explanation: Personal Mail: These are mails addressed to particular individuals. They are normally open to whom they are addressed.

text: In order to eliminate barrier to effective communication, the sender should

options.A: use as much jargons as he can.
options.B: consider the level of recipient's education.
options.C: expect the recipient to use a dictionary in decoding.
options.D: discourage the recipient from giving a feedback.

explanation: Consider the level of recipient's education in order to eliminate barrier to effective communication.

text: The machine that is used to destroy unwanted papers into unreadable pieces is
explanation: Shredding machine is a machine that cuts document in to small pieces so that no one can read them. Unwanted documents are fed into the machine and shredded into strips.

text: A diagram that shows the line of responsibilities and authorities in a company is
explanation: Organizational chart is a graphic representation or a blueprint of all units, divisions and departments and their duties in an organisation.

text: A meeting conducted yearly by companies is
explanation: Annual general meeting: This is a compulsory meeting which all companies are required by law to hold once in a year. The law stipulates that the gap between two such meetings should not exceed fifteen months. It is conducted yearly by the companies.

text: The department that is responsible for replenishing stock in an organization is the
explanation: Purchasing department: This is the department that is responsible for buying raw materials, stationery, components, tools, plant & machinery e.t.c in an organisation. It is also responsible for replenishing stock in an organisation.

text: An advantage of central filing is that it ensures
explanation: The merit or advantage of central filing is that it ensures easy or quick access to files.

text: Mails requiring prompt attention are
explanation: Urgent mails: These are mails that require prompt attention. Once a mail is marked 'urgent', it should be attended to first before others. The contents should be checked immediately to facilitate speedy action.

text: Which of the following equipment is used for electronic filing?
explanation: Computer is an electronic device that accept data through input unit, process the data according to the instruction supplied to it by the user and transfer the result to a unit where it can be stored or print out. It is an equipment or device that is used for electronic filing.

text: The correspondence conveying the same information to different organization is/are
explanation: Circulars is correspondence conveying the same information to different organisation. It is an official letter that is sent to a large number of people at the same time.

text: The list of items to be discussed in a meeting is
explanation: Agenda is a list of all the items that have to be discussed at a meeting. It is arranged in the order in which they will be discussed.

text: Which of the following factors will be considered before buying office furniture?
explanation: Size of the furniture is one of the factors that will be considered before buying office furniture.

text: The principles of organization which states that a worker should not take orders from more than one superior officer is
explanation: Span of control: is the principles of organisation which states that a worker should not take order from more than one superior officer. It states tha number of subordinate that a superior officer can take.

text: One of the ways a receptionist show pleasantries to visitors is by

options.B: welcoming all visitors with a smile
options.C: welcoming them with a big hug

explanation: One of the ways a receptionist shows pleasantries to visitors is by welcoming all visitors with a smile.

text: One of the advantages of a close office layout is that it

options.A: enhances the prestige of the user.
options.D: enables common use of office equipment.

explanation: One of the advantages of a close office layout is that it enhances the prestige of the user.

text: Particulars of letters sent out from an office are entered in the
explanation: Dispatch book is a document that shows where the particulars of letters sent out from an office is documented.

text: A requirement of a valid meeting is that

options.A: some proxies should be in attendance.
options.C: all members should be in attendance.
options.D: items of its agenda should be completed.

explanation: A requirement of a valid meeting is that there should be a quorum. A quorum is the minimum number of members of a meeting that must be present before the commencement of a meeting.

text: A filing system where records are kept by various section within an organization is
explanation: Departmental filing system is a filing system where records are kept by various section within an organisation. It is different from centralized because all the departments create and maintain their files separately.

text: The term office equipment refers to
explanation: Office equipment refers to tools or machines that are used to carry out particular jobs or activities. They are assets used for the day-to-day running of an office.

text: Which of the following document is not used for business transaction?
explanation: Circular is not used for business transaction. It is an official letter that is sent to different number of people at the same time.

text: The opinion of an investigatory committee on its findings is stated in the report as
explanation: Recommendation is the opinion of an investigatory committee on its findings. It is the report of an Investigating committee on the issuers or findings.

text: One of the disadvantages of numerical system of filing is that

options.B: there may be congestion in a file
options.D: there is difficulty of document retrieval where date is unknown

explanation: One of the disadvantages of numerical system of filing is that there is difficulty of document retrieval where date is unknown.

text: The abbreviation "ref" on the letterhead of an organization represents
explanation: The abbreviation "ref" on the letterhead of an organisation represents reference.

text: A filing classification in which documents are stored according to their title is
explanation: Subject filing is a filing classification in which documents are stored or filed according to their title or topic.The topic or title of the document forms that basis for this system.

text: A good information should be
explanation: A good information should be relevant, clear, accurate, timeliness, target, quality and complete.

text: Economy in the use of office equipment is one of the advantages of
explanation: One of the advantages of an open office is economy. This is because the cost of lighting and heating is reduced and also there is saving on floor space simply because the office is not partitioned.

text: Formal meeting held by the directors of an organization to consider policy issues is
explanation: Board meeting is a formal meeting held by the board of directors of an organisation to consider policy issues.

text: Which of the following types of correspondence is used to convey information to a large number of customers?
explanation: Circular letters is a type of correspondence that is used to convey information to a large number of customers.

text: The part of a report where the highlights of an investigatory committee's assignment are stated is the
explanation: Body is the part of a report where the highlights of an investigating committee's assignment or findings are stated.

text: An example of open office in a school is the
explanation: Staff room is an example of open office in a school system.

text: One of the duties of a mail room clerk is to

options.B: ensure that enclosures are attached to outgoing mail.
options.C: give advance notice to addresses of incoming mail.
options.D: return uncleared letters to the writers.

explanation: One of the duties of a mail clerk is to ensure that enclosures are attached to outgoing mail.

text: Standardized letters which give the same information and reply to regular inquires and requests are
explanation: Standardized letters which give the same Information and reply to regular inquires and requests are confidential letters.

text: The use of a picture to convey information to receiver is an example of
explanation: Visual communications is communication through visual aid. It is the conveyance of ideas and details in form of maps, photography, signs, drawings, graphs, charts, pictures and video.

text: The process of interpreting a received message is
explanation: Decoding is a process of interpreting a received message

text: The means of internal communication in an organization is
explanation: Circular is the means of internal communication in an organisation. It is used to pass across information to all workers in an organisation.

text: A document from the seller to the buyer showing the date, description and quantity of goods supplies is
explanation: Delivery note is a document sent by the seller to the buyer for signature when goods delivered to him and it will serve as evidence that delivery has been made. It shoes description of goods, quantity of goods and date of supply.

text: In an organization, a receptionist may sometimes act as
explanation: In an organisation, a receptionist may sometimes act as secretary.

text: The tenure of an ad-hoc committee is
explanation: Ad-hoc committee is setup to organise a special assignment and their tenure is six month only.
